Description: Postcard; printed paper; shows the Sidi Gaber mosque, Alexandria, with fields and a tethered bullock in the foreground.
Curator's comments: Old card; good condition; postally unused; one corner slightly creased from having been previously mounted in an album.
Associated places: Topographic representation of: Alexandria (Egypt), Sidi Gaber mosque
Acquisition notes: Purchased London and Collectors Fair, 26th January 2014.
